casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Amanda Gayle REED 331A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2016 Matthew C. Coxe, Attorney at Law, for Reed, Amanda Gayle. Melody R. Hairston, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of September 2016."
